intro: Explore a haunted mansion, uncover a killer’s madness, and enter surreal paintings in this chilling horror adventure.
description:
Death Frame is a psychological horror experience where reality fractures with every step. You play as the estranged child of a notorious serial killer, returning to the mansion you’ve inherited after years of silence. Within its rotting walls, you uncover paintings that pull you into fragmented memories and surreal dreamscapes—each revealing a piece of your father's madness, his victims, and maybe… your own bloodstained legacy.
As you explore the decaying estate, you'll find three disturbing diaries: a cold list of victims, the terrified final words of a captive, and the spiraling thoughts of a mind consumed by madness. Each reveals a new layer of the truth.
But something still lingers in the house.
Something watching.
Waiting.
